author: kilasuit
body:
We regularly see Issues like #14772 being raised

We could stop this with an update to the message that is displayed when a new version is available to download

I am happy to get a PR raised for this

comments.author: 237dmitry
comments.body: The message depends on `-NoLogo` parameter and user `$profile`. For example, I did not receive it. Can you send message as a system notification?

comments.author: MyTime1969
comments.body: PowerShell ver.7.1.2 is not relesed on Microsoft Store.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: We would want to fix the release pipeline, to hold on publishing the release until all packages are available.

title: Change the "New version of PowerShell" message"
